title: Any forum for selling household items?
content:
My daughter is in the final year in PESU and is moving out of her rented house. She is looking to sell some furniture and some household appliances. Is there a forum in college or anywhere else where we can put these things up for sale?

Thanks.

comments.body: we got parents on r/pesu before gta 6

ðŸ˜‚ sorry about that. I am just an over-involved, overenthu parent.

And my daughter is super embarrassed that I  am on this sub ðŸ˜„

I go offline for a week and I come back and see parents on r/PESU ðŸ˜­

As someone said, Facebook groups work well in Bangalore for selling things. There's quite a few groups like the flat and flatmates groups. But if you're trying to sell directly to PES kids, then you can make the listing here and someone might reach out.
A 300 L Electrolux refrigerator and a 30 L IFB microwave.
